member.name: M:Poi.Sdk.AcquirerServiceClient.SendRequest(Poi.Sdk.PoiRequestBase,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Generic method to send [any type of] request to the authorization host specified. Throw exception in case of invalid request.
member.param: Request to be sent. Must inherit from SdkRequestBase.
Determines wether the transaction should be completed.
member.returns: Return a class corresponding to the request. Must inhertir from SdkResponseBase.

member.name: M:Poi.Sdk.AcquirerServiceClient.SendAsyncRequest(Poi.Sdk.PoiRequestBase,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Generic method to send asynchronous request. This method uses specific method to each kind of message to be sent.
member.param: Request to be sent. Must inherit from SdkRequestBase.
Determines wether the transaction should be completed.
member.returns: Return a class corresponding to the request. Must inhertir from SdkResponseBase.

member.name: M:Poi.Sdk.AcquirerServiceClient.Communicate``2(``0,System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Sends a request to server, and try deserialize the response into Tout type, if is not possible try deserialize into AcceptorRejection.
member.typeparam: Type to try deserialize the server response
member.param: the request message in ISO20022 format.
the route to send the request in server base address.
member.returns: an object that inherits of response base can be the Tout or a AcceptorRejection

member.name: M:Poi.Sdk.AcquirerServiceClient.TryDeserializeResponse``1(System.String)
member.summary: Try deserialize the incoming string as the expected response or acceptor rejection.
member.param: server response as string

member.summary: Private member represented by Transactions property.

member.name: P:Poi.Sdk.TransactionStatusReport.TransactionStatusReportRequest.Transactions
member.summary: Contains all transactions to be sent and sought after. This property uses ValidRequest property to validate wether should return null or the current transaction collection. If it isn't a valid request (ValidRequest equals to false), then this property returns null.

member.summary: An interface to the creation, forcing user application to send a valid request.

Collection of transaction containing all data needed by Transaction Status Report
member.returns: new instance of TransactionStatusReportRequest

member.name: M:Poi.Sdk.TransactionStatusReport.TransactionStatusReportRequest.ValidateRequest
member.summary: Validates all mandatory data. Throw exception if needed.

member.name: T:Poi.Sdk.TransactionStatusReport.TransactionStatusReportResponse
member.summary: Represents an interfaced transaction status report response. Converts all ISO20022 data into organized information that can be used by SDK user.

member.summary: Private member represented by Transaction property.

member.name: P:Poi.Sdk.TransactionStatusReport.TransactionStatusReportResponse.Transactions
member.summary: Contains all transactions to be sought after.

member.summary: Private member represented by ResponseStatus property.

member.summary: It basically says wether the transactions were found in database.

member.name: M:Poi.Sdk.TransactionStatusReport.TransactionStatusReportResponse.#ctor(Poi.Sdk.TransactionStatusReport.TransactionStatusReportRequest,Poi.Sdk.Model._2._0.ResponseBase)
member.summary: Creates/fills corresponding properties/members of the class.
member.param: responses classes can be of AcceptorTransactionStatusReportResponse or RejectionResponse. Each one represents a different response treatment by this class.
Interfaced request, containing all transaction collection sent to Transaction Status Report.

member.name: M:Poi.Sdk.TransactionStatusReport.TransactionStatusReportResponse.Validate(Poi.Sdk.TransactionStatusReport.TransactionStatusReportRequest,Poi.Sdk.Model._2._0.ResponseBase)
member.summary: Throws exception if some mandatory field or property is invalid. Parameters request and response should match, that is, both are request/response from the sabe Transaction Status Report.
member.param: Interfaced request
Raw (ISO 20022) response

member.name: M:Poi.Sdk.TransactionStatusReport.TransactionStatusReportResponse.GetMappedTransactionCollection(Poi.Sdk.TransactionStatusReport.TransactionStatusReportRequest)
member.summary: Only called when not all transactions were found in database. So this method treats the response list of transactions and returns a new list corresponding to all transactions requested (including transactions not found, specifying the reason thet were not returned).
member.param: Interfaced request sent
member.returns: Corresponding request response
